bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Learning Technology—IMS Content Packaging Information Model (CP) Version 1.2—Mapping to the Conceptual Model for Resource Aggregation
IEEE Recommended Practice for Learning Technology—IMS Content Packaging Information Model (CP) Version 1.2—Mapping to the Conceptual Model for Resource Aggregation

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Specified in this recommended practice is how the elements and attributes defined in the IMS Content Packaging Information Model (CP) Version 1.2 relate to the components of the conceptual model for resource aggregation defined in IEEE Std 1484.13.1-2012.

Specified in this recommended practice is how the elements and attributes defined in the IMS Content Packaging Information Model (CP) Version 1.2 relate to the components of the conceptual model for resource aggregation defined in IEEE Std 1484.13.1™-2012.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
